reviews.text: This is good stuff, delicious sauce and meatballs. And my husband loves the tomato cream with the pepporcini and I love the pasta Primavera. Recommendation...
I ordered delivery and was pleasantly surprised. The pasta was cooked past al dente but the thick and hearty noodles were very good the way they were...
Decided to order from the Florentine last night. Very easy to order from DoorDash. Ordered the spaghetti with mushroom sauce. The pasta was nice and firm...
